item.title: 早间竞价：零售业受到关注，欧洲局势趋于稳定，股市再创新高
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官将面临参议院的严厉质询和新的举报人指控
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）周二将面对美国参议员就该公司的安全文化以及一名新举报员工的指控提出的严厉质询。【原文：Boeing CEO Dave Calhoun will face tough questions from U.S. senators on Tuesday over the planemaker's safety culture as well claims from a new whistleblower employee.】

item.title: 对冲基金与贷款人的交易表明危机时期结构的回归
item.description: 今年早些时候，一家对冲基金安排了两笔价值 6.42 亿美元的交易，这是自 2008 年危机以来从未有过的。该基金向两家美国贷款机构出售贷款组合损失保险，然后将大部分风险出售给投资者。【原文：Earlier this year a hedge fund structured two trades worth $642 million, the kinds of which have not been seen since the 2008 crisis. It sold insurance to two U.S. lenders against losses on a loan portfolio, and then sold much of that risk to investors.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，日立计划出售江森自控空调合资公司 40% 的股份
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，日本日立公司正在考虑出售其在与江森自控国际有限公司（Johnson Controls International Plc）的合资空调企业中持有的 40% 股份。【原文：Japan's Hitachi is considering selling its 40% stake in an air-conditioning joint venture with Johnson Controls International Plc , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国证券监管机构誓言对非法活动采取 "零容忍 "态度
item.description: 中国证券监管机构周二誓言，将对资本市场的非法活动采取 "零容忍 "态度，并将所有金融活动纳入监管范围。【原文：China securities regulator vowed on Tuesday it will maintain a "zero-tolerance" stance on illegal activities in the capital markets and will include all financial activities in regulation.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，因后视摄像头问题，Stellantis 将召回 100 多万辆汽车
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周二表示，Stellantis 公司正在美国召回 100 多万辆汽车，原因是后视摄像头出现问题，导致图像无法显示，增加了车祸风险。【原文：Stellantis is recalling over one million vehicles in the U.S. over a problem with rear view cameras that stopped images from displaying, raising the risk of a crash, the U.S. auto safety regulator said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 石油和玉米组织联手提起诉讼，要求终止拜登卡车排放规定
item.description: 美国最大的石油和玉米行业游说团体周二表示，他们将就乔-拜登总统领导的政府削减重型车辆排放的导致地球变暖的废气计划提起诉讼，认为这些法规将对经济造成损害。【原文：The top U.S. oil and corn industry lobby groups said on Tuesday they were suing the administration of President Joe Biden over its plan to slash planet-warming emissions from heavy-duty vehicles, arguing the regulations will cause economic harm.】

item.title: 欧盟表示将推迟巴塞尔银行资本规则的核心内容
item.description: 欧盟金融服务主管周二表示，由于美国 "极有可能 "推迟实施，欧盟将把全球银行资本监管规则最后部分的一项核心内容的实施时间推迟一年，至 2026 年 1 月。【原文：The European Union will peg back implementation of a core element in the final leg of global rules governing bank capital by one year to January 2026, citing a "highly likely" delay in the United States, the bloc's financial services chief said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 报告称，人工智能可帮助航运业减少排放
item.description: 自主航运初创公司Orca AI周二进行的一项研究显示，通过在海上航行中部署人工智能，全球商业航运业每年可减少碳排放4700万吨。【原文：The global commercial shipping industry could cut down its carbon emissions by 47 million tonnes per year by deploying artificial intelligence for sea navigation, a study by autonomous shipping startup Orca AI showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 新加坡淡马锡将向壳牌出售 Pavilion 能源公司
item.description: 新加坡全球投资公司淡马锡（Temasek）周二表示，已同意将其持有的液化天然气（LNG）贸易公司 Pavilion Energy 100%的股份出售给壳牌（Shell）。【原文：Singapore's global investment company Temasek said on Tuesday it has agreed to sell 100% of its shares in liquefied natural gas (LNG) trading firm Pavilion Energy to Shell .】

item.title: 消息人士称，马斯克计划向特斯拉绩优员工授予股票期权
item.description: 特斯拉首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周一告诉员工，这家电动汽车制造商正在为表现出色的员工提供股票薪酬。【原文：Tesla CEO Elon Musk told employees on Monday that the electric vehicle maker is working on stock-based compensation for high-performing employees, according to two people who reviewed an internal memo.】

item.title: 中国房地产措施促进销售，但仅限于大城市
item.description: 中国最新的房地产支持措施促进了最大城市的交易，但较小城市的活动却难以启动，这表明中国大部分地区的房地产市场将面临更多困难。【原文：China's latest property support measures have boosted transactions in its biggest cities, but activity in smaller localities is struggling to get off the ground, pointing to more pain ahead for most of the country's real estate market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行警惕通胀，保持利率稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二一如预期维持利率稳定，但警告称仍有理由对通胀风险保持警惕，这导致市场降低了今年降息的可能性。【原文：Australia's central bank held interest rates steady on Tuesday as expected, but warned there were still reasons to be vigilant against inflation risks, leading markets to pare back the chance of a rate cut this year.】

item.title: 早间竞标关于费率
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将现金利率维持在 4.35% 不变
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二一如预期维持利率稳定，同时重申不排除在必要时进一步提高利率以控制通胀。【原文：Australia's central bank held interest rates steady on Tuesday as expected, while reiterating that it was not ruling out further increases if needed to control inflation.】

item.title: 电动汽车初创企业菲斯科申请破产
item.description: 由于与一家大型汽车制造商的交易谈判破裂，美国电动汽车制造商菲斯科于周一晚些时候申请破产保护，这使这家初创公司面临在美国和欧洲交付其 "海洋 "SUV而快速烧钱的后果。【原文：U.S. electric vehicle maker Fisker filed for bankruptcy protection late on Monday as deal talks with a big automaker collapsed, exposing the startup to the fallout of a rapid cash burn to deliver its 'Ocean' SUVs in the United States and Europe.】

item.title: 北约 11 亿美元基金瞄准人工智能、机器人和太空技术
item.description: 北约盟国财团已确认首批获得资助的公司，这是该财团 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）创新基金的一部分。【原文：A consortium of NATO allies has confirmed the first tranche of companies awarded funding as part of the group’s one billion euro ($1.1 billion) innovation fund.】

item.title: 日本电子漫画平台 Infocom 将决定 Blackstone 的收购要约
item.description: 日本数字漫画发行商 Infocom 周二表示，一旦所有披露文件准备就绪，该公司将宣布董事会对 Blackstone 收购要约的决定。【原文：Japanese digital comic distributor Infocom will announce its board's decision on a takeover bid from Blackstone once all its disclosure documents are ready, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国经济规划师称消费者对新能源汽车的需求可能保持快速增长
item.description: 中国最高经济规划师周二表示，中国消费者对新能源汽车（NEV）的需求可能会保持快速增长，这将增加对电动汽车充电基础设施的需求。【原文：Chinese consumer demand for new energy vehicles (NEVs) is likely to maintain its fast growth, which will increase the need for electric vehicle charging infrastructure, the country's top economic planner said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本电子漫画平台 Infocom 表示尚未决定 Blackstone 的收购要约
item.description: 日本数字漫画发行商 Infocom 周二表示，一旦所有披露文件准备就绪，该公司将宣布董事会对 Blackstone 收购要约的决定。【原文：Japanese digital comic distributor Infocom will announce its board's decision on a takeover bid from Blackstone once all its disclosure documents are ready, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 丰田在海外压力下召开股东大会，但在国内获得广泛支持
item.description: 丰田汽车公司董事长丰田章男可能因治理和丑闻而受到全球投资者的压力，但他在周二参加年度股东大会的普通投资者中仍然很受欢迎。【原文：Toyota Motor Chairman Akio Toyoda may be under pressure from global investors over governance and scandals, but he remains popular among mom-and-pop investors who attended its annual shareholder meeting on Tuesday.】

item.title: 亚洲股市走高；澳元在澳大利亚央行利率决议前保持坚挺
item.description: 周二，在美联储官员发表讲话之前，亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，澳元持稳，澳大利亚股市在该国利率决议公布前上涨。【原文：Asian stocks tracked Wall Street higher on Tuesday ahead of a chorus of Federal Reserve officials due to speak later in the day, while the Australian dollar held steady and domestic shares rose ahead of the country's interest rate decision.】

item.title: 市场等待美联储更多线索，美元摇摆不定；澳大利亚央行会议成为焦点
item.description: 周二，随着市场对法国极右翼政府风险的担忧减弱，美元走低，扩大了前一天兑欧元和英镑的跌幅。【原文：The dollar drifted lower on Tuesday, extending the previous day's losses against the euro and sterling, as market jitters over the risks of a far-right French government receded.】

item.title: 石油因需求坚挺而上涨，中东紧张局势支撑风险溢价
item.description: 周二早盘，油价上扬，延续了上一交易日的涨势，原因是需求前景更加强劲，而且投资者相信欧佩克+产油国可能暂停或扭转从今年第四季度开始提高供应量的计划。【原文：Oil prices ticked up in early trade on Tuesday, extending gains from the previous session on a stronger demand outlook and investor confidence that OPEC+ producers could pause or reverse plans to raise supplies from the fourth quarter of this year.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回埃克森公司起诉激进投资者代理申请案
item.description: 美国法官周一驳回了埃克森美孚对激进组织 Arjuna Capital 提起的诉讼，因为该组织同意今后不再向公司年会提交代理申请。【原文：A U.S. judge on Monday dismissed a lawsuit Exxon Mobil had filed against activist group Arjuna Capital after the group had agreed not to pursue future proxy filings at the company's annual meetings.】

item.title: 菲利浦-莫里斯公司在华盛顿特区发出传票后暂停 Zyn.com 在全国范围内的销售
item.description: 烟草巨头菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International）周一表示，将在全国范围内暂停瑞典火柴北美公司（Swedish Match North America）旗下 ZYN.com 网站的在线销售，因为 Zyn 尼古丁袋生产商正在对哥伦比亚特区（D.C. ）的传票做出回应。【原文：Tobacco giant Philip Morris International said on Monday that it would suspend online sales on Swedish Match North America's ZYN.com nationwide as the Zyn nicotine pouch maker responds to a subpoena from the District of Columbia (D.C.).】

item.title: 早间竞价：分歧、脱节，但尚未出现错位......
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 空中客车公司称，市场条件促使国际航空公司远离巴西
item.description: 空中客车公司在巴西的负责人告诉路透社，复杂的市场条件阻碍了外国航空公司在巴西开展本地业务。【原文：Complicated market conditions have prevented foreign airlines from launching local operations in Brazil, planemaker Airbus' head in the country told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国将关闭受 Change 黑客攻击的医疗保险提供商的预付款计划
item.description: 美国医疗保险与医疗补助服务中心（Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services）周一表示，它计划关闭一项预付款计划，该计划旨在帮助受联合健康（UnitedHealth）技术部门 Change 服务中断影响的一些医疗保险提供商和供应商。【原文：The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services said on Monday it plans to close an advance payments program it started to help some Medicare providers and suppliers hit by service disruptions at Change, UnitedHealth's technology unit.】

item.title: 由于房屋交付量增加，伦纳第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: Lennar Corp 周一公布的第二季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是现有房屋供应量处于历史低位，导致新房建设需求持续增长。【原文：Lennar Corp beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Monday, as historically low existing supply of houses led to sustained demand for new home construction.】
